price: On that night the angels and the Spirit [i.e., Gabriel] descend by their Lord’s permission with all decrees[2].
arabic: تَنَزَّلُ ٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةُ وَٱلرُّوحُ فِيهَا بِإِذۡنِ رَبِّهِم مِّن كُلِّ أَمۡرٖ
footnotes: [2] Bringing down the exact provisions, life, death, and other things destined for the creatures for the coming year by Allah's permission.
